ðŸ“– Summary: Docling is a Python library designed to simplify document processing and parsing of various formats, including PDFs, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, and HTML. It provides advanced PDF understanding capabilities, seamless integrations with the gen AI ecosystem, and supports local execution for sensitive data.
